mapper.sql: id, log_type, log_content, business_type, business_id, log_date, api_name
mapper.insert: insert into gateway_log (id, log_type, log_content, business_type, business_id, log_date, api_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into gateway_log (id, log_type, log_content, business_type, business_id, log_date, api_name) select #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{logContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{logDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{apiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual where not EXISTS (select id from gateway_log where log_type = #{logType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and business_id=#{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
